text:
<!everyone> happy friday folks!
two quick things for you:
1. superpath got $1k as part of AppSumo's <https://sell.appsumo.com/black-friday-fund|Black Friday Fund>. I'm thinking of using the money to buy some superpath swag but am open to other fun ways to invest this money in the community. have an idea? lemme know :face_with_cowboy_hat:
2. there have been some great conversations in slack this week, but i wanted to highlight <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CTF6SG2GP/p1634069622173500|this one on hiring PR firms> (:wave: <@U010GTFAFK9>) and <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1634155381155500|this one on how to organize and layout your content strategy> (:wave: <@U01LS5NHXBK>)
okay, jobs!
---
*## featured full-time roles:*
---
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190944-content-team-lead-animalz|Content Team Lead> (new :rocket:), <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19184-technical-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Technical Content Marketing Manager>
• <http://Spreadsheet.com|Spreadsheet.com> is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188552-head-of-content-spreadsheetcom|Head of Content>
• Knoetic is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/190006-senior-marketing-manager-knoetic|(Senior) Marketing Manager>
• Mosiac is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188072-content-marketing-writer-mosaic|Content Marketing Writer>
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>
• Kibo Commerce is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186833-content-marketing-manager-kibo-commerce|Content Marketing Manager>
• Confetti is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186720-growth-marketing-manager-confetti|Growth Marketing Manager>
• Three Ventures is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/185894-senior-paid-search-manager-three-ventures|Senior Paid Search Manager>
• Hyper is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/185469-storyteller-content-lead-hyper|Storyteller, Content Lead>
• The Stoke Group is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/186759-senior-content-strategist-and-writer-the-stoke-group|Senior Content Strategist & Writer>
• Balto is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/181920-content-and-audience-growth-manager-balto|Content & Audience Growth Manager>
• Oyster is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172422-product-marketing-manager-oyster|Product Marketing Manager> (really cool content-adjacent role)
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/167776-senior-product-marketing-specialist-verblio-accelerator-verblio|Senior Product Marketing Specialist> (w/ a video Q&A :tv:)
• Hubspot is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/160604-senior-marketing-manager-strategic-partner-marketing-startups-hubspot|Senior Marketing Manager, Strategic Partner Marketing, Startups> (very cool role focused on VCs/startups)
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29030-staff-writer-campfire-labs|Staff Writer> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
• First National Realty Partners is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/158132-content-manager-first-national-realty-partners|Content Manager> (:wave: <@U01MV98FQAY>)
• Inai is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/154610-lead-copywriter-remote-inai|Lead Copywriter ( Remote)>
• Stratabeat is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/147950-seo-and-content-specialist-stratabeat|SEO & Content Specialist>
---
*freelance projects:*
• Campaign Monitor is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/184558-freelance-content-writer-campaign-monitor|Freelance Content Writer>
• Exponent is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/179312-freelance-content-writer-exponent|Freelance Content Writer>
• Bananatag is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/176833-freelance-content-writer-and-strategist-for-blog-migration-bananatag|Freelance Content Writer & Strategist for blog migration>
• Fitt Insider is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173103-social-and-newsletter-writer-fitt-insider|Social & Newsletter Writer>

• Clearbit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/163608-freelance-writer-editor-clearbit|Freelance writer / editor> (:wave: <@UJ2MPBP7V>)
